title: Dead.Rising.3.Apocalypse.Edition.Update1.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Dead.Rising.3.Apocalypse.Edition.Update1.Repack-R.G.Mechanics




Release Info:


Release year : 2014
Genre : Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Capcom Game Studio Vancouver
Published by : Capcom
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack : FTS



System Requirements:

Operating system : Windows 7, Windows 8 (only 64-bit)
Processor : Intel Core i3-3220 @ 3.30Ghz (or Intel Core 2
Quad Q9550 2.83GHz) / AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.00 GHz or higher
Memory : 6 GB
Video : NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570 / AMD Radeon 7870 or higher
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 24.9 GB

Game information:


Dead Rising 3 Apocalypse Edition includes the best game
about zombies open game world, and four sets of downloadable
add-ons. Welcome to the Apocalypse! Sharpen axes and
shotguns charge - zombies are waiting!


Game Features:

Welcome to Los Perdidos - ten years after the events in Fortune
City welcomes you with a huge open to moving, stunningly painted
world town Los Perdidos, hordes of zombies and mad plot. Thriller
with the struggle for survival is now unfolding on the screen -
PC version is equipped with a full support for Steam and gaming
devices.

Zombies crawling out of the woodwork - their programmed behavior
has become more dangerous and smarter, and now they pass information
to each other, so that the character will be able to save only a
desperate agility and resourcefulness.

Hundreds cunning improvised vehicles and weapons - the city is
scattered many components that can be improved and combined with
each other, including the fearsome weapon Boom Cannon or trucks
Party Slapper.

You can be afraid alone, but can be together - if you join forces
and make a marathon for the destruction of zombies, the points
earned experience will remain with you when you return to the
game in single player mode.

Bonus downloadable content - now, the set includes all four
additions from the series The Untold Story of Los Perdidosa.
Each downloadable complement your protagonist and his insane
weapons and transport, which can be transferred to the main game.


Instructions for Steam network in Dead Rising 3 Apocalypse Edition:


0) (Optional) Create a new account on Steam to a new e-mail address
1) Download and install the package from the game
2) Copy the contents of the MP-Fix folder with the game,
confirming the replacement. ( Caution: Fix portrait of all existing
conservation. If you have previously passed the game, the game starts again.)
3) Download and install the client Steam (who have it yet)
4) Run Steam and log into your account
5) Start the game
6) First we need to start a new game and go through the training
mission, to get away from the zombies in order: Create the server to the Game:
6.1) Enter the garage and send an invitation to friends.
Connecting to servers:
6.2) accepted an invitation to play.

FAQ on the game:


For a normal start of the game will require a system that
meets the minimum system requirements for the game.

a) The game supports only 64-bit operating system since Windows 7 and above.
b) The game will only run on graphics cards with support for DX 11 and above.
c) need to be updated all the drivers and installed all the necessary software
components. (For graphics cards from Nvidia need to roll back to version 335.23 WHQL)


How to change the screen size ratio 16:10 and 21: 9 :


If you have any problems with the change of sides EKPA in Dead Rising 3,
then apply the following workaround. Catalog Go to the game  data  datafile 

Open the file viewport.txt
Now look for the line Aspect = "1.777777778" and change it to Aspect = "2.333333333"
for (21: 9) and Aspect = "1.6" for the (16:10)

Lockups games in the selection of figurines is solved by
changing the localization of any other through the game options.

If the problem did not dare, then wait for patches.


Repack Features:


Dead Rising 3 Apocalypse Edition
Version of the game - v1.0 Update1 (from 09/11/14)
Do not cut / recoded
Choice of language games (in the game menu)
Additions :
Episode 1: Operation Broken Eagle
Episode 2: Fallen Angel
Episode 3: Chaos Rising
Episode 4: The Last Agent
